message: So based on Figure 3-4 (page 64), I'm somewhat surprised that the authors don't revise and rule out 2 of their 6 Archetypes. Both Feudal and Anarchy are virtually non-existent in the authors' *large* base of companies. Anyway, what it tells me, is that there are really 4 archetypes that dominate in real enterprises. Bad news basically if your YMCA finds itself in either the Feudal or Anarchy archetype for anything. :)
Singapore Dollar exchange rate (4/10/11) = 0.79USD. So $1M SD = $790k USD.
page 83 question: 99 out of 100 YMCAs would not "get" the question, let alone the answer.
Enjoyed (finally) the recognition that Govt/Non-Profits differ significantly. Did not enjoy the observation that Govt/Non-Profits are even more difficult in the governance arena. :(
